post.title: how to set samsung ps64d80000 1080 24p and xbmc
post.content: hi i have recently bought this new tv and i want to how i make sure that the tv is outputting 1080 24p. i am using xbmc running on an asrock 3d vision pc. question is how do i set everything to work in this manner, im a noob at this kinda of thing as you can probably tell
